verses.verse: Like <S%H7950>snow<s%> in <S%H7019>summer<s%> and like <S%H4306>rain<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> <S%H9202>honor<s%> is not <S%H5000>fitting<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>

Like a <S%H6833>sparrow<s%> in [its] <S%H5110>flitting,<s%> like a <S%H1866>swallow<s%> in [its] <S%H5774>flying,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause<s%> does not <S%H935>alight.<s%>
A <S%H7752>whip<s%> is for the <S%H5483>horse,<s%> a <S%H4964>bridle<s%> for the <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> And a <S%H7626>rod<s%> for the <S%H1460>back<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
Do not <S%H6030>answer<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> according to his <S%H200>folly,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> you <S%H1571>also<s%> be <S%H9586>like<s%> him.
<S%H6030>Answer<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> as his <S%H200>folly<s%> [deserves], <S%H6435>Lest<s%> he be <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

He <S%H7096>cuts<s%> <S%H7096>off<s%> [his own] <S%H7272>feet,<s%> [and] <S%H8354>drinks<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> Who <S%H7971>sends<s%> a <S%H1697>message<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>
[Like] the <S%H7785>legs<s%> [which] <S%H1802>hang<s%> <S%H1802>down<s%> from the <S%H6455>lame,<s%> So is a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
Like one who <S%H9503>binds<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> in a <S%H4773>sling,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> is he who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H9202>honor<s%> to a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>
[Like] a <S%H2336>thorn<s%> [which] <S%H5927>falls<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H7910>drunkard,<s%> So is a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
[Like] an <S%H7228>archer<s%> who <S%H9123>wounds<s%> <S%H3605>everyone,<s%> So is he who <S%H7936>hires<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> or who <S%H7936>hires<s%> those who <S%H5674>pass<s%> by.
Like a <S%H3611>dog<s%> that <S%H7725>returns<s%> to its <S%H6892>vomit<s%> Is a <S%H3684>fool<s%> who <S%H8138>repeats<s%> his <S%H200>folly.<s%>
Do you <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>? There is <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> for him.
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> "There is a <S%H7826>lion<s%> in the <S%H1870>road!<s%> A <S%H738>lion<s%> is in the <S%H7339>open<s%> <S%H7339>square!<s%>"
[As] the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H5437>turns<s%> on its <S%H9482>hinges,<s%> So [does] the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> on his <S%H4296>bed.<s%>
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H2934>buries<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in the <S%H6747>dish;<s%> He is <S%H3811>weary<s%> of <S%H7725>bringing<s%> it to his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> is <S%H2450>wiser<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> men who can <S%H7725>give<s%> a <S%H2940>discreet<s%> <S%H7725>answer.<s%>
[Like] one who <S%H2388>takes<s%> a <S%H3611>dog<s%> by the <S%H241>ears<s%> Is he who <S%H5674>passes<s%> by [and] <S%H9378>meddles<s%> with <S%H7379>strife<s%> not belonging to him.
Like a <S%H9231>madman<s%> who <S%H3384>throws<s%> <S%H2131>Firebrands,<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> and <S%H4194>death,<s%>
<S%H3651>So<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H7411>deceives<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> And <S%H559>says,<s%> "Was I not <S%H7832>joking<s%>?"

For <S%H657>lack<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3518>goes<s%> out, And where <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7279>whisperer,<s%> <S%H4066>contention<s%> <S%H8367>quiets<s%> <S%H8367>down.<s%>

[Like] <S%H6352>charcoal<s%> to <S%H1513>hot<s%> <S%H1513>embers<s%> and <S%H6086>wood<s%> to <S%H784>fire,<s%> So is a <S%H4066>contentious<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H2787>kindle<s%> <S%H7379>strife.<s%>

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H7279>whisperer<s%> are like <S%H3859>dainty<s%> <S%H3859>morsels,<s%> And they <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H2315>innermost<s%> <S%H2315>parts<s%> of the <S%H990>body.<s%>

[Like] an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H2789>vessel<s%> <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H5509>dross<s%> Are <S%H1814>burning<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> and a <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
He who <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H9330>disguises<s%> [it] with his <S%H8193>lips,<s%> But he <S%H7896>lays<s%> up <S%H4820>deceit<s%> in his <S%H7130>heart.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> he <S%H6963>speaks<s%> <S%H2603>graciously,<s%> do not <S%H539>believe<s%> him, For there are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
[Though his] <S%H8135>hatred<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> itself with <S%H4860>guile,<s%> His <S%H9567>wickedness<s%> will be <S%H1540>revealed<s%> before the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>
He who <S%H3738>digs<s%> a <S%H7845>pit<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> into it, And he who <S%H1556>rolls<s%> a <S%H68>stone,<s%> it will <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> on him.
A <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%> those it <S%H1790>crushes,<s%> And a <S%H2509>flattering<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H6213>works<s%> <S%H4072>ruin.<s%>
